price: (Yaa Muhammad!) jedhi: “yoo Rahmaaniif ilmi jiraatee, silaa anatu jalqaba warra (isa)(ilma san) gabbaraniiti.” {1}
arabic: قُلۡ إِن كَانَ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَلَدٞ فَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡعَٰبِدِينَ
footnotes: {1} garuu Rabbiin ilma hinqabu, kanarraa qulqullaawwe.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul in kāna lilrraḥmāni waladun fa-anā awwalu al-ʿābidīna
